title: The Cnidarians
text:
This website hosts The Cnidarians. A book about, you guessed it, Cnidaria. The book is currently being written‚Ä¶ IN THE OPEN! üò± What does that mean exactly? Well, it means that you can follow along on this journey over the coming months, years, or however long it takes me to complete this edition. I‚Äôve always considered writing a book a daunting task and perhaps a lonely one. This is why I‚Äôve chosen to write this book out of the attic. It‚Äôs an experiment of mine. I wanted to see if sharing this journey with you, and receiving your comments during this process could make this all a little more fun, and hopefully a fairer representation of the field!




Photograph by Ganapathy Kumar
